items.value:
Activate the connection to have:
- Backup for game data
- Possibility to watch videos with reward
- Access to the shop of golden screws
- Subscription bonuses
Restart the App to enable the store

Will you be able to get them all?
Try it !!
Even the biggest need a little push.
We give you your first motorcycle. Without a doubt, you will never forget.
Drag the motorcycle to the starting grid.
Touch a motorcycle while it's running to increase its speed for a few seconds.
In the store you can get more motorcycles. You can buy more by unlocking new motorbikes.
The last motorcycle with coins will appear on the quick buy button.
By joining two motorcycles with the same number, they become a single one of the next number. Don't stop the "Merging" !
Who does not want an improvement?

It increases speed, revenue and decreases the cost of motorcycles.
Tip: As soon as you can.. Buy !

You can buy screws with real money. They are also achieved by leveling up.
They are doing well to unlock motorcycles faster.

Attention !! A swarm of insects arrives !
Crush them all and if necessary even with the helmet.
If you finish everyone on time, the "boss" will appear. If you smash it too, there will be a reward.
If you also watch a video you will receive extra reward according to the crushed insect.

When you have a few motorbikes running, activate the turbo.
You will see how the purse increases !
In the menu you can see your profile with statistics and trophy progress, consult the information panels at ease or configure different aspects of the game such as sound or services.
Recycle that is good for inventory

If you run out of space in the inventory and cannot combine motorcycles, you can always recycle them. At least they will return some coins.
Drag the motorcycle and drop it in the garbage can.

Does the game entertain you?
Rate me please!
Infinite missions. Once you complete them, they start again to continue getting rewards. Exchange your screws for long-term improvements.
The time for missions has arrived!
Exchange for screws in the "Exchange" tab:
Roulette of fortune is here! Spin it to get a secure prize. Three free spins a day in exchange for a simple video each. Try it!!
Connect to services to use this functionality
The climatic effects put your motorcycles in trouble. Touch the obstacles on the track to earn coins.
Join two equal motorcycles and you will see what happens
In the store you can get more motorcycles
The last motorcycle obtained with coins will appear in the quick purchase button
Put motorcycles to run to earn coins. Drag the motorcycle to the starting grid
Touch a motorcycle while its running to make it fly
Start the turbo and let the party begin
Smash all the insects before they escape!
Rains! Tap the puddles and earn coins
In the flag you will find missions to get screws and you can use them in a big way
In the star, you can see your progress, check information and change the settings
On the wheel, you can exchange coins for wheels and in the store buy upgrades
In the screw, you can get lots of screws for the cause
Not able to connect to services.

There could be Ads not recommended for children.
You declare that your age is 13+? If not close the game please
Wait! Storks don't bring motorcycles. Find and get the parts down.
Play Match3 minigames when you want and get rewards.
